snippet: Radcliffe, the 41-year-old world-record holder, plans to race in her final marathon when she competes in London in April.
abstract: Women's marathon world-record holder Paula Radcliffe, at age 41, is making London Marathon her final race.
lead_paragraph: Radcliffe, the 41-year-old world-record holder, plans to race in her final marathon when she competes in London in April.
